title: Bine (1976) Genesis Portion (Agedna)
description: Bine translation of the first four chapters of the book of Genesis published by Wycliffe Bible Translators in 1976. Bine, also known as Pine, Kunini, Masingara or Oriomo is a Papuan language of New Guinea.

language.name: Bine
language.area: Western Province, Daru District, south of Fly River.
